title: why the hell do Kennen chroma's cost so much???

replies.body: Because they came with splash arts gg
did they really tho?
ya.... Kennen's skins are mostly pretty bad. Only ARctic is good.

> [{quoted}](name=Eleshakai,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=je5jMOzf,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-04-16T16:09:41.971+0000)
>
> ya.... Kennen's skins are mostly pretty bad. Only ARctic is good.

They aren't bad, they are just really really lazy

> [{quoted}](name=bulletbear,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=je5jMOzf,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-04-16T16:11:20.190+0000)
>
> They aren't bad, they are just really really ~~lazy~~ **OLD**

They aren't lazy skins, they are just extremely outdated (those first two were release skins, and Kennen is one of the oldest champs in the whole game). Whenever Kennen gets a VU for the Y.U.P. initiative, they'll give him more differentiable skins, just like they did for Tristana and Alistar.
This, Riot Girl Trsitana used to be a (pretty bad) recolor too, now it's a rather distinct skin with it's own model.
It's actually my favorite skin since the update :D

> [{quoted}](name=junglerboy16,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=je5jMOzf,comment-id=000400000001,timestamp=2015-04-16T17:34:00.685+0000)
>
> They aren't lazy skins, they are just extremely outdated (those first two were release skins, and Kennen is one of the oldest champs in the whole game). Whenever Kennen gets a VU for to Y.U.P. initiative, they'll give him more differentiable skins, just like they did for Tristana and Alistar.

You're right. Old fits a bit better. They were made long ago and their standards have increased dramatically since then
And like they did for Nidalee. Snowbunny and Leopard Nidalee used to just be recolors on the outfit, now they're recolors -and- awesome cat forms.

indeed the mexican ali is even cooler cause of the horns than my black alistar now!
I love the spanish one :P
Deer horns @.@

What he needs is a new skin.
All his skins predates Riot current standard for their skins.
rusted blitzcrank, anyone?

Riot at least had the decency to remove that skin because it was so terrible haha. Now if only they would do something about these. Hopefully they will remake them so they are actually different

(I'd still kill for a rusty blitz skin)

As I recall, a certain Gem Knight used to have most recolors to, until they got rid of his pizza feet.
Same with certain unslowable sword master, until the same scenario.

The lightning mouse is just showing his age. I'm sure Riot will get to it . . . eventually.

(Rusted blitz though. . . It's basically bragging right to have that thing. It'd loose it's value if they were to "fix" it.)

This. 
Rusted blitz is something of a legend. And I have only seen one in my life
same with black alistar, except they updated it and it looks pretty lame now.

> [{quoted}](name=bulletbear,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=je5jMOzf,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-04-16T16:11:20.190+0000)
>
> They aren't bad, they are just really really lazy

They're not bad or lazy, they're old as dirt. Look at a lot of the old champs that haven't gotten visual updates. A lot of them have lots of recolors because they weren't good at making skins way back when. You should look up the old TF and his 'Legendary' skin, Magnificent Twisted Fate. lol.
Hey, don't diss Kennen M.D.
And Karate Kennen is cute, too, if a little blocky.  I'm really hoping for a Kennen VU specifically so that skin can deliver on what it promises.
I don't know what you are talking about, thats Kennen, Deadpool, and Yoda.
Give this man a cookie

my bad :(
lol nice one

Whatever happened to that Grand Yordle Unification Pass or whatever?  Tristana is looking really good these days.  Any chance Kennen gets a piece of that action?  I know there are like eight of us who still play him at all, but I think his concept could appeal to a lot of different groups of people with a little polish.
actually ever since the "kennen lights up the top lane" home page thing.. ive seen him a lot.. urgot and viktor too..
Multiverse Chroma - Jedi, Deadpool and, umm, add a Pikachu/Sonic/Mario colored version.

WHAT RIOT DID JUST CHANGE HIS ROBE'S COLOR , AND CHANGES A LITLE BIT TEXTURE . WTF . #SwampMasterKennen
Well u see, the red Kennen's mask covers his whole face and the green one has no eye brows. It's money well spent if u ask me.
I got the 100th upvote. I win.

Same for Ashe and Malzahar
Splash art OP  GG

For real though, as others have pointed out, every time an old champ gets a proper VU, their worst skins pre-VU almost always end up being their best skins post-VU.

These skins will likely be among his coolest after he gets a VU, just watch.
